entry.def: A Yankee is a person from a northern or north-eastern state of the United States.

entry.tran: 美国佬，美国人（一些讲英国英语的人的说法，可能具冒犯意味）
entry.def: Some speakers of British English refer to anyone from the United States as a Yankee. This use could cause offence.

means.word_mean: 1. an American who lives in the North (especially during the American Civil War)
2. an American who lives in New England
1. used by southerners for an inhabitant of a northern state in the United States (especially a Union soldier)
